title.narrative: Jordan: Support to Jordanian Democratic Institutions and Development (EU-JDID)

description.narrative: With a focus on engaging more women and young people, the EU Support to Jordanian Democratic Institutions and Development (EU-JDID) works at the parliamentary and political party level, as well as engaging civil society organisations and a credible electoral process. The programme supports Jordan with its political reform process, including the promotion of inclusive policy and decision-making processes.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Cooperation and Development
